de.javasoft.swing.jydocking
Class DragOutlinePreview

java.lang.Object
  de.javasoft.swing.jydocking.DragOutlinePreview

public class DragOutlinePreview
extends java.lang.Object

Dragging preview - by default a red outline border. Optional UI-properties:

  • JYDocking.dragPreview.className - String, class name of custom drag preview class, must extend DragOutlinePreview.
  • JYDocking.dragOutlinePreview.color - Color, outline color - default is RED.

    • Version:
    1.01, 24.08.2009
